title: internal_reconcile_report_job Lambda Output
description: The output for the internal_reconcile_report_job Lambda.

anotherPage.description: Indicates if more results can be retrieved on another page.

id.description: The unique job ID of the reconciliation job.

orcaArchiveLocation.description: ORCA S3 archive bucket the reconciliation targets.

inventoryCreationTime.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, of inventory report initiation time from the s3 manifest.

lastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, when status was last updated.

errorMessage.description: Critical error the job ran into that prevented it from finishing.

reportTotals.description: The number of error reports of each type.

orphan.description: Number of files that have records in the S3 archive bucket but are missing in the ORCA catalog.

phantom.description: Number of files that have records in the ORCA catalog but are missing from S3 bucket.

catalogMismatch.description: Number of files that are missing from ORCA S3 bucket or have different metadata values than what is expected.
